page.title: 01HOUSING IN BRAMHALL.
page.content: The average house has 3 bedrooms, a bathroom, a kitchen, a lounge room and a dining room; often attached to the lounge room. Bigger houses might have another toilet, a second lounge, a fourth bedroom or study, and a laundry. It is quite common to have a loft in the roof, which can be used as a room. Most houses are two storeys. Cloak cupboards are very common, usually under the stairs. There are a lot of semi-detached and terraced houses. Houses have a t.v. set, a refrigerator, an oven and a washing machine. A lot of houses also have a video, tumble dryer, a dishwasher, and a home computer. Most of the houses are fairly old, some with bay windows, lead lighting, and open fireplaces, but Bramhall also has a couple of estates of modern houses.
